text: The Winding Stair is a 1925 American silent drama film directed by John Griffith Wray and starring Alma Rubens, Edmund Lowe and Warner Oland.Goble p.1018 It is based on the 1923 novel of the same name by the British writer A.E.W. Mason.The AFI Catalog of Feature Films:The Winding Stair ==Cast== * Alma Rubens as Marguerite * Edmund Lowe as Paul * Warner Oland as Petras * Mahlon Hamilton as Gerard * Emily Fitzroy as Madame Muller * Chester Conklin as Onery * Frank Leigh as Andrea * Zalla Zarana as Fifi * Jane Thomas ==Preservation status== *The film is lost.The Library of Congress American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:The Winding StairThe Winding Stair at silentera.com ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan.
